Package sailpoint.api

Class EncodingUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.api.EncodingUtil
  • public class EncodingUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for hash or encrypt Identity secret, based on setting in system configuration. It should be only applied to IdentityIQ Identity password, password history, Link password history, and authentication question answers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      EncodingUtil()

    • Method Detail

      • isHashingEnabled

        public static boolean isHashingEnabled​(SailPointContext context)
        Checks whether hashing is enabled in System Configuration.
        Parameters:
        context - SailPointContext
        Returns:
        true if hashing is enabled in System Configuration, false if not

      • encode

        public static java.lang.String encode​(java.lang.String secret,
                                      SailPointContext context)
                               throws GeneralException
        Encodes the string based on the configuration, either hashed or encrypted. This should be only invoked for SailPoint Identity password, password history and authentication question answers. If the passed secret is already hashed, then the hashed value will be returned. If the passed secret is encrypted and hashing is enabled, hashed value will be returned. If the passed secret is encrypted and hashing is not enabled, original encrypted value will be returned. If the passed secret is null, then null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        secret - string to be encoded
        context - SailPointContext
        Returns:
        hashed or encrypted value
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • isMatch

        public static boolean isMatch​(java.lang.String secret,
                              java.lang.String encryptedOrHashedValue,
                              SailPointContext context)
        Returns whether the passed in secret matches the hashed or encrypted value based on the encryption or hashing algorithm.
        Parameters:
        secret - the raw value
        encryptedOrHashedValue - hashed or encrypted value
        context - SailPoint context
        Returns:
        true if it matches

      • isEncrypted

        public static boolean isEncrypted​(java.lang.String secret)
        Checks if the passed in string value is encrypted.
        Parameters:
        secret - the string value
        Returns:
        true if it is encrypted

      • isHashed

        public static boolean isHashed​(java.lang.String secret)
        Checks if the passed string value is hashed.
        Parameters:
        secret - the string to be checked
        Returns:
        true if it is hashed.

        public static java.lang.String encrypt​(java.lang.String src)

        Parameters:

        Throws:
